title: Activity-Based Self-Directed Learning Program for Teacher Educational Technology Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of introductory instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Developing applicable educational technologies for real classroom settings through activity-based learning with digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can apply activity-based instructional methods that integrate behaviorist, cognitivist, and constructivist approaches when designing lessons.
Learners can design three or more class activities that engage students using digital educational resources.
Learners can revise and improve lesson designs based on formative assessment feedback.

resources: Digital educational content creation tools (Canva, Google tools, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
